application.name: apolloPanTime
application.brief: Determine the exposure time and duration for an Apollo panoramic camera image.
application.description: Determine the exposure time and duration for an Apollo panoramic camera image.

parameter.name: FROM
parameter.brief: The input pvl prefix from apolloPanTransform. Do NOT include a / at the end of the path!
parameter.description: The input pvl prefix from apolloPanTransform. Do NOT include a / at the end of the path! Example: Example: /archive/missions/apollo_pan/AS15/REVS04-16/REV16/AS15-P-9372

parameter.name: OUTPUTDIRECTORY
parameter.description: The output directory where the PVLs will be written.
